name: Unfinished Dream
description:
The teenager wakes up in the gloomy laboratory with severe headache.

And strange memories flash in his brain from time to time. 

There is only one thought in his brain: Escape! 

He have to go down the building, facing various of enemies, try to find a way out!

And retrieve the lost memory...

What fate will he face?

Good luck, have fun.

Control Keyboard GamePad

Thanks for playing!

Present you by Electric Sheep Team Designer: Tilapia Programmer:  Alivecat Artist: Jude , Oustar , Joe , Fankalk Audio Designer: Waizer

Thanks to those nice itch.io creater who have provided us free assets!

And also you can download a windows version, 

with a higher frame rate and better controller feedbacks.
